skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spot the set
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Spot the Set is a fun game designed to help build concentration and focus. There are three levels and four rounds per level - followed by a “Super Bonus” level. Players advance rounds by getting three in a row and early ToyBot™ Tokens that can be redeemed for virtual prizes.

Levels and round are as follows:


Voice level:
- Round 1: voice sets
- Round 2: speed sets
- Round 3: volume sets
- Round 4: Lightning Round (2x points)

Word level:
- Round 1: Letter sets
- Round 2: Color sets
- Round 3: Shape sets
- Round 4: Lightning Round (2x points)

Sound level:
- Round 1: Instrument sets
- Round 2: Animal ses
- Round 3: Vehicle sets
- Round 4: Lightning Round (2x points)

Super Bonus level (unlocked after all prior levels have been completed)

Commands
- “Change level” - Change levels
- “Reset” - Start over
- “Tokens” - Hear how many ToyBot™ Tokens earned

Why it’s really educational: This experience is designed to build executive function skills such as working memory, flexible thinking, and self control in a fun, engaging way!

About SayKid
By combining voice technology and tangible play, we help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way - without screens! For more on our innovative approach to screen-free, play-based learning, see our TEDx Talk on our website. 


Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Challenge
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium

Search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. If you found the skill helpful, we really appreciate reviews!
